sentences: Nicola Manzan (Treviso, 2 March 1976) is a multi-instrumentalist graduated in violin.

The album, inspired by the "mondo-movies" such as the cult-documentary of the 1960s Mondo Cane by Paolo Cavara, and is full of quotations (expressed through the dialogues) that refer to the cynical atmosphere of these "mondo-movies," while there are also parts which makes reference to melody.
